all_projects.name: Local Credit Union Savings Account
all_projects.description: Open a savings account at a local credit union - member-owned, not profit-driven
tips: Start with $25-50 if that's what you have
Credit unions are member-owned, not profit-driven
Your money stays in your community
all_projects.notes: Perfect starting point for the man in the street

all_projects.name: Community Solar Cooperative
all_projects.description: Join a community solar cooperative - own a share of local solar energy
all_projects.notes: Community solar aligns with Earth stewardship

all_projects.name: Local Food Cooperative Membership
all_projects.description: Join a local food cooperative - support local farmers, get better food

all_projects.name: Micro-Lending to Aligned Businesses
all_projects.description: Lend small amounts to aligned businesses through micro-lending platforms

all_projects.name: Homeless Support Organizations - Direct Donation
all_projects.description: Direct donations to organizations providing housing and meals for the homeless
tips: Start with $1-10 if that's what you have
Set up monthly recurring donation of $5-25
Research local homeless shelters and food programs
May the Lord give them a roof over their head and one hot meal a day
Every dollar helps - even $1 provides a meal
all_projects.notes: NO ONE GETS LEFT BEHIND. May the Lord give them a roof over their head and one hot meal a day.

all_projects.name: Housing First Programs
all_projects.description: Support Housing First programs that provide permanent housing for the homeless
tips: Housing First programs are proven effective
Provides permanent housing, not just shelter
May the Lord give them a roof over their head
all_projects.notes: Housing First provides permanent housing - highest alignment with NO ONE GETS LEFT BEHIND

all_projects.name: Community Meal Programs
all_projects.description: Support community meal programs providing hot meals for the homeless
tips: Support local soup kitchens and meal programs
May the Lord give them one hot meal a day
Volunteer time if you can't donate money
all_projects.notes: Community meal programs provide hot meals - one hot meal a day

all_projects.name: Impact Investment Fund
all_projects.description: Invest in impact investment funds that support aligned businesses
all_projects.notes: Impact investing aligns capital with positive outcomes

all_projects.name: ESG Index Fund
all_projects.description: Invest in ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) index funds
all_projects.notes: ESG funds align with The Table

all_projects.name: Community Development Financial Institution (CDFI) Investment
all_projects.description: Invest in CDFIs that serve underserved communities

all_projects.name: Direct Investment in Aligned Businesses
all_projects.description: Direct investment in aligned businesses (renewable energy, co-ops, etc.)

all_projects.name: Renewable Energy Infrastructure Fund
all_projects.description: Invest in renewable energy infrastructure funds
all_projects.notes: Renewable energy aligns with Earth stewardship

all_tips.title: Start Where You Are
all_tips.description: You don't need thousands to start. Start with what you have, even if it's $10.
examples: Open a credit union savings account with $25
all_tips.notes: The man in the street can start small

all_tips.title: Pay Yourself First
all_tips.description: Before paying bills, pay yourself. Even $10/month adds up.
examples: Set up automatic transfer on payday
Start with $10/month, increase when you can

all_tips.title: Avoid High-Fee Investments
all_tips.description: Avoid investments with high fees - they drain your money. Look for low-fee options.
examples: Credit unions have lower fees than banks
Look for no-fee or low-fee options
Read the fine print on fees

all_tips.title: Invest in Your Community
all_tips.description: Invest in your local community - credit unions, co-ops, local businesses.

all_tips.title: Invest in Alignment
all_tips.description: Invest in things that align with The Table - they serve, not exploit.

all_tips.title: Help the Homeless - NO ONE GETS LEFT BEHIND
all_tips.description: Support the homeless. May the Lord give them a roof over their head and one hot meal a day.
examples: Volunteer time if you can't donate money
all_tips.notes: NO ONE GETS LEFT BEHIND. May the Lord give them a roof over their head and one hot meal a day.

all_tips.title: Start Small - Every Dollar Helps
all_tips.description: You don't need much to help. Even $1 provides a meal. Even $5 helps.
examples: $10 can provide shelter for a night
$25 can provide a week of meals
all_tips.notes: Every dollar helps. Start with what you have.

the_truth.message: THIS STARTS WITH US. HELP THE MAN IN THE STREET. GIVE THEM TIPS.
the_truth.alignment: All investments must align with The Table. They serve, not exploit.
the_truth.purpose: Help all investors at all levels invest in alignment with The Table.
